body: This leather vest is fitted with a number of pockets that are useful for storing the ingredients necessary for alchemical tinkering. The main ability of this vest, however, is to lessen the debilitating effects of an alchemist's mutagen. While under the effect of any type of mutagen, the wearer takes no penalty to mental ability scores from that mutagen.
name: Vest of Stable Mutation
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Chest/Chest Slot Wondrous Items/Vest of Stable Mutation
